This top is cute, but runs small.  Amazon said a large would fit me best.  Nope.  Needed an extra large. It’s a snugger fit than I expected.  The fabric was not what I expected at all.  I thought it was more of a sweatshirt type fabric, but it has more of a slippery feel to it.  It’s warm like a sweatshirt, and about as thick, so that’s not a problem.  It just surprised me.  On the other hand, I don’t think it will pill like a cheaper sweatshirt does.  I would buy again in a larger size.
Perfect, easy to wear, sweatshirt with cute stripped design. True to size.
The item arrived and runs small and is not stretchy

评论概述: Great fit when ordering your regular size.
评论详情: Love this shirt. Definitely a new favorite! I am 5’3 & 145lb and I ordered a medium. Not to tight and not to loose. I have a longer torso so It is a little shorter than it looks on the model in the pic but no complaints!

I loved and shirt fit when I opened and tried on.  I washed it on cold and to my horror the blue had bled all over the orange and it's awful now.  Regardless the shirt is ruined and I didn't even get to wear.  So frustrated!!!!
Does not look like the picture in the middle section. It was supposed to be grey.  The inside of it seems poor quality. Definitely not the quality I was expecting

I like the top.  I ordered the leopard with blue and orange.  Cute design.  Well made.  The pattern at each band coincides (match) perfectly at sides and sleeves.  Whoever the seamstress was did an excellent job.  The material is a heavy t-shirt weight.  Nice for spring/early summer or fall wear. I personally would not wear during the winter because I like material that provide warmth.  If you like the t-shirt look with a little design flair, you will like this shirt.  I purchased this because my favorite color is orange and it’s hard to find clothing in that color. I wish the orange was on the top band and the blue was on the bottom.  I will probably just wear this around the house to lounge in.

评论概述: It’s not white. It’s tanish color
评论详情: I loved this top- but it’s not white like the pic shows. It’s more tanish cream color.

Different pink than shown and more form fitting/straight cut  than shown. Did not have cute exposed seams which made it super casual and a great weekend sweatshirt. If I saw the one sent to me in a store I would lot have picked it up.

I got the black & gray leopard with the zipper in XL. I always wear an XL in tops but this is huge - more like a XXL or 2X. I’m definitely returning but debating whether to reorder in a Large which would fit great. It’s really cute and pretty comfy but for the material, it’s overpriced. This is more of a $26-28 top, not $35.

评论概述: Cute but not for pear shapes!
评论详情: Super cute, but I’m a pear shape and this was too big in the bust and too tight over my hips. My tall 13 year old loves baggy sweatshirts, so she stole it and it’s adorable on her. Not wasted, but wanted to give my other pear gals a heads up.

Just a plain sweatshirt, not very thick but looks nice.  A little pricey as far as I'm concerned for what you get.  I'm 5'5" and between 150 to 160 and bought an XL, fits a little on the bigger side but, not bad.
I like the softness and length of this sweatshirt. My only complaint is that the middle color is more yellowish that I thought. I thought it would be more brown or off-white. It's almost pale yellow.
The color is not red, it more like a dark magenta. The fit is true to size. Well made

评论概述: What you get is not what is pictured

I love the unique design of this top, but the fabric just feels so synthetic--almost like plastic cloth, for lack of a better term. I wish it had a cotton blend. It just feels like I'm going to sweat in it if I wear it all day, even if it's not a hot day. Just not really breathable fabric at all. Could be a great item if the manufacturer were to change to a better material.
This is not regular sweatshirt material!!! This comes a bit large. It can pair well with leggings, jeans, or sweats.

Did fine in the laundry. I washed it turned inside out, then hung to dry. Will try the dryer next time. The design is funky and people notice. It's a fun sweat shirt. Usual size is a medium. This medium is really wide in the shoulders; hangs down about 3 inches on my wife's shoulders. It also hangs below the butt, which made a great outfit paired with black tights.

I ordered this shirt in a size large - when I received it - it was way too big!  The shirt is very cute and is probably very comfortable.  So, I returned this shirt and ordered it in a size Medium.  I recommend this shirt but  keep in mind that it does run big.
The quality is ok. Not as thick as I thought it would be. This sweatshirt is more on the thinner side so it could still be worn in kooler weather as well. Fits true to size.

评论概述: It's fun and she loves it!
评论详情: This is super fun top and my art teacher wife loves it. It's polyester and isn't going to shrink so no need to buy a size larger. I really like the look and feel of this top. It is extremely soft. The pattern is unique and fun. I've never had a top like this and I am really looking forward to wearing it.

This is a fun sweater. Fits as expected. The colors are vibrant and look like the photo provided in the description. I haven’t washed it yet, but the seems like it will hold up well. It’s got some weight to it, the inside isn’t soft and fuzzy, but it’s a comfortable sweater.  I wear a medium normally, but I requested a large because I wasn’t sure if the sizing would be accurate. This definitely fits like a large.
This has become my favorite sweatshirt. Everyone always asks me where I got it from. The fit is great and the texture is nice.

I absolutely love the brown faces on this top!  I wore with leggings and combat styled boots, hair in a bun with huge loop earrings... I received a handful of compliments.  The fit was perfect.
